Name: Analog
Desc: Analog clock with a simple date and time in the bottom of the screen.

Keys.Name: Delay in Milliseconds
Keys.Description: How many milliseconds to wait before making the next write?

Keys.Name: Show seconds hand
Keys.Description: Whether to show the seconds hand or not.

Keys.Name: Color settings
Keys.Description: This allows you to configure the colors

Variables.Name: Minimum red color level
Variables.Description: Minimum red color level. The minimum accepted value is 0 and the maximum accepted value is 255.

Variables.Name: Minimum green color level
Variables.Description: Minimum green color level. The minimum accepted value is 0 and the maximum accepted value is 255.

Variables.Name: Minimum blue color level
Variables.Description: Minimum blue color level. The minimum accepted value is 0 and the maximum accepted value is 255.

Variables.Name: Minimum color level
Variables.Description: Minimum color level. The minimum accepted value is 0 and the maximum accepted value is 255 for 255 colors or 16 for 16 colors.

Variables.Name: Maximum red color level
Variables.Description: Maximum red color level. The minimum accepted value is 0 and the maximum accepted value is 255.

Variables.Name: Maximum green color level
Variables.Description: Maximum green color level. The minimum accepted value is 0 and the maximum accepted value is 255.

Variables.Name: Maximum blue color level
Variables.Description: Maximum blue color level. The minimum accepted value is 0 and the maximum accepted value is 255.

Variables.Name: Maximum color level
Variables.Description: Maximum color level. The minimum accepted value is 0 and the maximum accepted value is 255 for 255 colors or 16 for 16 colors.

Name: Digital
Desc: Simple date and time in the middle of the screen.

Keys.Name: Delay in Milliseconds
Keys.Description: How many milliseconds to wait before making the next write?

Keys.Name: Display date
Keys.Description: Whether to show the date or not.

Keys.Name: Color settings
Keys.Description: This allows you to configure the colors

Variables.Name: Minimum red color level
Variables.Description: Minimum red color level. The minimum accepted value is 0 and the maximum accepted value is 255.

Variables.Name: Minimum green color level
Variables.Description: Minimum green color level. The minimum accepted value is 0 and the maximum accepted value is 255.

Variables.Name: Minimum blue color level
Variables.Description: Minimum blue color level. The minimum accepted value is 0 and the maximum accepted value is 255.

Variables.Name: Minimum color level
Variables.Description: Minimum color level. The minimum accepted value is 0 and the maximum accepted value is 255 for 255 colors or 16 for 16 colors.

Variables.Name: Maximum red color level
Variables.Description: Maximum red color level. The minimum accepted value is 0 and the maximum accepted value is 255.

Variables.Name: Maximum green color level
Variables.Description: Maximum green color level. The minimum accepted value is 0 and the maximum accepted value is 255.

Variables.Name: Maximum blue color level
Variables.Description: Maximum blue color level. The minimum accepted value is 0 and the maximum accepted value is 255.

Variables.Name: Maximum color level
Variables.Description: Maximum color level. The minimum accepted value is 0 and the maximum accepted value is 255 for 255 colors or 16 for 16 colors.

Name: Emoji
Desc: Shows an emoji in the middle of the screen.
